channel.title: Hosting
channel.description: Hi, I've made a server and coding is no problem for me. But is there a chance that my computer/router is not able to host a server? My router is a ''Sitecom''. I've tried multiple things like hosting by utorrent or port forwarding but everything failed to get it online... PLease help?

item.title: Hosting
item.dc:creator: @nickelback nickelback
item.description:
@nickelback wrote:

Hi, I’ve made a server and coding is no problem for me. But is there a chance that my computer/router is not able to host a server? My router is a ‘‘Sitecom’’. I’ve tried multiple things like hosting by utorrent or port forwarding but everything failed to get it online… PLease help?

Read full topic
